cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING *y 17th APRIL/ 1918*1. ' The Germans delivered heavy attacks this morning against the 53rd Division, who are holding the line North of BAILLEUL* These attacks were repulsed with heavy loss to the enemy, .2* The Germans are reported to have retaken KETEREK,3. As far as is known we still hold WYTSCHAETE.4* On the rest of the front there is no ohange. The weather is had.* General Staff,War Office, S.W,1* 17th April, 1918.Issued at 6.30 pvm.
